name: War of Color
description:
WAR OF COLORS

Zero Player Game

Choose your color government and take over the world. Battles are almost fully automatic. If your army is in trouble, you can use Survival Move - special move, based on your government, for example: call for help, or assassinate a few enemies.

Controls:
Menus - ARROWS and WASD with Space/Enter.
On world map and in battle (Survival Move) use mouse.
F9 - take screenshot.
